review: Awesome gadget to convert your normal tv has su smart. Its great to use Netflix or YouTube at tv. I like so much.
author: Carlos

review: Great gadget for little money! Works like a charme and does exactly what it's expected to do... not more, not less :-)
author: Kristian Peetz

review: Best thing ever!! Simple, useful, watch my chrome tabs and youtube on tv!! And for the price it is worth it.
author: Isauro

review: I really love it. It is easy to set up and works flawlessly. I recommend this product if you wasn't an easy way to get internet content and music into your living room.
author: Niko

review: Product works as expected, perfect for casting YouTube videos and chrome tabs directly on the tv screen! Very good product !
author: gaetan d

review: Even though Amazon warned me about the possibilty of a lesser experience in Europe, I love my ChromeCast. Easy setup and it performs just like I expected.
author: M Veltmaat

review: it's brilliant! for those that have older tv's that are not smart...most of the smart tv's have this option of sharing content from your mobile device to the screen anyway...
author: MR MINDAUGAS SCIUKAS

review: It worked with YouTube and pandora , delivery to Australia was expensive but I am happy enough with it thanks
author: Peter manderson

review: Very easy to set up and use looking forward to more app support.Excellent device works like a dream, makes streaming from phone and tablets so simple.
author: konrad thomas

review: The Chromecast does everything I expected it to, and does it very well. My only complaint is that the number of apps that support streaming to Chromecast is a bit limited at the moment. It also doesn't support admittedly crap technologies such as Silverlight. Still, if you want a great yet simple and cheap streaming device, this is a great buy.
author: Andreas Eklöv
